title: How to Become a Battle for Middle Earth 2 Master

steps.headline: If you are online, make the game no-rush for at least 5 minutes.
steps.description: No-rush means that players can't attack you for 5 minutes. This will give you time to build your army.

steps.headline: Set a lot of Mines, Slaughterhouses or Mallorn trees with one builder and an archery range with the other.
steps.description: This will ensure you have enough resources and command points to keep your army going.

steps.headline: Build a regular set of barracks.
Deploy your army towards the enemy (provided no rush time is up).
Set all your Barracks and archery ranges to spawn around 10 sets of soldiers.
Keep this renewed over the course of the battle.
Build all the other buildings and upgrade your fortress.
Keep sending armies towards the enemy.

text: If you are online, make the game no-rush for at least 5 minutes. No-rush means that players can't attack you for 5 minutes. This will give you time to build your army. Set a lot of Mines, Slaughterhouses or Mallorn trees with one builder and an archery range with the other. This will ensure you have enough resources and command points to keep your army going. Spawn 2 sets of archers.  Build a regular set of barracks.  Spawn 2 sets of soldiers.  Deploy your army towards the enemy (provided no rush time is up).  Set all your Barracks and archery ranges to spawn around 10 sets of soldiers.  Keep this renewed over the course of the battle.  Build all the other buildings and upgrade your fortress.  Keep sending armies towards the enemy.
